variants.Description in input context: L104F mutation in the DJ-1 gene

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing the L104F mutant DJ-1 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: The L104F mutation reduced cell viability by 30% compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Mock transfection (empty vector) was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% compared to wild-type control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% compared to wild-type control.
